OrgName.entry: ST CHADS CHURCH 3RD AGE MINISTRY - FRIENDSHIP GROUP

Desc.entry: A friendship group for people aged 50 years and over which meets for social activities including talks, discussions and interest afternoons, refreshments included.

Telephone.entry: Mon, Tues, Thurs 10am-2pm, Fri 10am-12noon and answerphone

category.entry: CLUBS FOR OLDER PEOPLE - POSTAL DISTRICT 8
